historicEventInformations.remarks: Date '1534' most likely not authentic [Cat. Hamburg 2007, No. 119]

pageContext.description:
'Half-length portrait facing right against a greenish-grey background. In the bottom third of the painting there is a text block with [...] verse, top right a coat-of-arms.' 
[G. Walczak, Cat. Hamburg 2007, No. 119]
pageContext.dimensions:
Dimensions of support: 23.8 x 14.3 cm
Dimensions without text block: 18.8 x 14.3 cm
[Cat. Hamburg 2007, No. 119]
pageContext.inscription:
Recto bottom:
'ESTPATEFACTAITERUM CHRISTI MONSTRANTE LVTHERO
GRATIA QVAE TENEBRIS ANTE SEPVLTRA FVIT
FORSITAN HIC VERE EST POSTREMAEAETATIS HELIAS
TANTO ANIMO BELLUM PROPRIETATE CIET.'
[Cat. Hamburg 2007, No. 119]

involvedPersons.suffix: Follower of Lucas Cranach the Elder
